page.title: 01Iveston Village
page.content: Iveston is a small village with a population of about eigty. most of te houses are made out of stone with slate roof. There are signs of an old building on a wall next to the chapel. The chapel was built in 1837 and is now converted into a house. Some of the houses have been plastered and then painted on the outside. There is a memorial for the people who were killed in the First and Second World Wars. Altogether there were sixteen killed.There are a lot of waggon wheels which seem to be the fashion.
